player_0.line_0: Welcome, young one. I see you have found your way to our humble dwelling.
player_0.line_1: This is Luna, my assistant. She's been quite eager to meet you.
player_0.line_2: Together, we shall embark on a most extraordinary journey.

kingdoma_0.line_0: Oh my! You're finally here! I've been waiting for ages!
kingdoma_0.line_1: Merlin has told me so much about you. Are you ready for an adventure?
kingdoma_0.line_2: I promise it will be the most magical experience you've ever had!

player_1.line_0: Now, before we begin, there are a few things you must understand.
player_1.line_1: Magic is not just about waving wands and casting spells.
player_1.line_2: It requires wisdom, patience, and above all, a pure heart.

kingdoma_1.line_0: But don't worry too much about all that serious stuff!
kingdoma_1.line_1: We'll have lots of fun learning together!
kingdoma_1.line_2: And I'll be right here to help you every step of the way!
